text: @realDonaldTrump You tweet this crap . . . rather than lead as a "War Time President" in this Covid19 scourge on the World.  You have those around you tested and wear in masks - to protect you!  With no commitment to protect anyone else!  You retreat - you are not a great POTUS  you are a POS!
